text: The Southern Star is the newspaper of Ozark, Alabama and one of the oldest newspapers in the Wiregrass region. It is a weekly publication and new editions are delivered every Thursday. The newspaper was founded in 1867 by Joseph A. Adams, a former Confederate soldier with no journalism experience, and it still owned by his descendants. The current status of this publication is unknown. Its website contains a message saying it was disconnected by the provider. ==References== ==External links== *The Southern Star Category:Newspapers published in Alabama Category:Dale County, Alabama Category:Publications established in 1867
title: The Southern Star (Alabama)
